summary: This mod adds 7 new fully NAV meshed shacks and 1 manor to skyrim
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds 7 new fully NAV meshed shacks and 1 manor to skyrim
This is for those who want immerssive rest stop's/player homes or for those who use Frostfall.
As i said all of the shack's are NAV meshed allso the manor is NAV meshed
You can see the map marker's on your map so you dont have to go and find them on your own.

Location's
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
last chance traders - Near Orotheim                                                        |
Sunspire Shack       - Between serpent's bluff redoubt and fort sungard      |
Giant's rest            - Between broken fang cave and fort greymoor            |
Windstall Shack      - Between snow veil sanctum and bleakcoast cave       |
Johtuns Shack        - Between robber's gorge and Dragons bridge               |
Hunter's rest          - Between Helgen and south shriekwind bastion           |
Thum's rest            - Between Fort Amol and broken limb camp                 |
Whitestun Manor    - Between windward ruins and mzinchaleft                  |
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
author: Paha989
